PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-04901998-03-240,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
PrecisEnactment of the IMPORTATION AND EXPORTATION OF FIREARMS REGULATIONS (INDIVIDUALS) which set out (a) the prescribed manner in which declarations regarding firearms entering and leaving the country must be made by individuals, (b) the manner in which customs officers may confirm the declaration, and (c) the manner in which detained or seized firearms will be disposed of.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0215 Publication Date: 1998-04-15
Attachments
